markdown: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, EDUCATION, AND WELFARE Office for Civil Rights Washington, D.C. 20201 ASSURANCE OF COMPLIANCE WITH PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE ACT SECTIONS 799A and 845 WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY: School of Medicine and School of Dentistry Name of Educational Unit(s)* Lindell & Skinker Blvds. Street Address St. Louis, Missouri 63130 City, State, Zip Code 314/863-0100 Area Code/Telephone Number The above-named Educational Unit and each Educational Unit for which this Assurance is given hereby agrees that it will not discriminate on the basis of sex in the admis-sion of individuals to any training program of the Educational Unit, as required by Section 799A of Title VII of the Public Health Service Act, Discrimination on the Basis of Sex Prohibited, and Section 845 of Title VIII of the Public Health Service Act, Prohibition Against Discrimination by Schools on the Basis of Sex, as applicable. This Assurance obligates each Educational Unit from the time any award under Titles VII or VIII is made to the Educational Unit. Each Educational Unit also agrees that it will comply with all Regulations issued by the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare pursuant to Sections 215(b), 799A, or 845 of the Act. Each Educational Unit has received a copy of, and understands the contents of, the "Explanation of Assurance" describing the obligations of the Educational Unit under Sections 799A and 845. Each Educational Unit further agrees that it will not operate any training program funded under Title VII or Title VIII of the Public Health Service Act for the benefit of, or in affiliation with, any other Educational Unit which discriminates on the basis of sex in the admission of individuals to any of the training programs of that Educa- tional Unit. Each Educational Unit further agrees that it will operate training pro- grams for the benefit of, or in affiliation with, any other Educational Unit only upon ascertaining that such other Educational Unit has submitted an Assurance of Compliance to the Office for Civil Rights, HEW, and that the Assurance has not been rejected. Each Educational Unit further agrees to furnish such information, and to permit such reasonable access to its records and other information relating to its obligations under Sections 799A and 845, as may from time to time be requested by the Director, Office for Civil Rights, HEW. DATE: 4/21/72 <::attestation: Signature Signed Signature: legible (Carl A. Daulm) BY (Chief Administrator, President, or other authorized official---signature and Title) Executive Vice Chancellor A handwritten signature is placed above a line, followed by printed text detailing the signatory's role and title, positioned in the lower middle of the document.::> *Signers of this Assurance are cautioned that terms herein are defined, for purposes of this Assurance and of compliance with Sections 799A and 845, in the "Explanation of Assurance," HEW-590A (3/72). If a college or university includes more than one Educational Unit at the same location the College or University may, if it chooses, file a single Assurance for all such Educational Units which will apply to all training programs of those Units. If this is done, attach a list of all Educational Units to which this Assurance applies. HEW - 590 (3/72) Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/gtpf0227

chunks.markdown: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, EDUCATION, AND WELFARE Office for Civil Rights Washington, D.C. 20201
ASSURANCE OF COMPLIANCE WITH PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE ACT SECTIONS 799A and 845

WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY: School of Medicine and School of Dentistry Name of Educational Unit(s)* Lindell & Skinker Blvds. Street Address St. Louis, Missouri 63130 City, State, Zip Code 314/863-0100 Area Code/Telephone Number

The above-named Educational Unit and each Educational Unit for which this Assurance is given hereby agrees that it will not discriminate on the basis of sex in the admis-sion of individuals to any training program of the Educational Unit, as required by Section 799A of Title VII of the Public Health Service Act, Discrimination on the Basis of Sex Prohibited, and Section 845 of Title VIII of the Public Health Service Act, Prohibition Against Discrimination by Schools on the Basis of Sex, as applicable. This Assurance obligates each Educational Unit from the time any award under Titles VII or VIII is made to the Educational Unit. Each Educational Unit also agrees that it will comply with all Regulations issued by the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare pursuant to Sections 215(b), 799A, or 845 of the Act. Each Educational Unit has received a copy of, and understands the contents of, the "Explanation of Assurance" describing the obligations of the Educational Unit under Sections 799A and 845.

Each Educational Unit further agrees that it will not operate any training program funded under Title VII or Title VIII of the Public Health Service Act for the benefit of, or in affiliation with, any other Educational Unit which discriminates on the basis of sex in the admission of individuals to any of the training programs of that Educa- tional Unit. Each Educational Unit further agrees that it will operate training pro- grams for the benefit of, or in affiliation with, any other Educational Unit only upon ascertaining that such other Educational Unit has submitted an Assurance of Compliance to the Office for Civil Rights, HEW, and that the Assurance has not been rejected.

Each Educational Unit further agrees to furnish such information, and to permit such reasonable access to its records and other information relating to its obligations under Sections 799A and 845, as may from time to time be requested by the Director, Office for Civil Rights, HEW.

<::attestation: Signature Signed Signature: legible (Carl A. Daulm) BY (Chief Administrator, President, or other authorized official---signature and Title) Executive Vice Chancellor A handwritten signature is placed above a line, followed by printed text detailing the signatory's role and title, positioned in the lower middle of the document.::>

*Signers of this Assurance are cautioned that terms herein are defined, for purposes of this Assurance and of compliance with Sections 799A and 845, in the "Explanation of Assurance," HEW-590A (3/72). If a college or university includes more than one Educational Unit at the same location the College or University may, if it chooses, file a single Assurance for all such Educational Units which will apply to all training programs of those Units. If this is done, attach a list of all Educational Units to which this Assurance applies.
